title: AWESOME BIG ONE BEDROOM** PLUS OFFICE!!!
posting_body: AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 1ST!
$1450 a month / 1 month security deposit required
Watch the tour video:
https://youtu.be/xnz-2VldXlE
Come check this out.
Freshly rehabbed one bedroom apartment with a separate office (extra bedroom) on the first floor in a quiet 4-unit building on a nice residential block.
Near all the Avondale fun stuff, close to the train, buses and just down Milwaukee to Logan Square.
Features include:
●	All new replacement windows and central heat with CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING
●	Oak cabinet kitchen with newer appliances ** BONUS DISHWASHER**
●	Redone bathroom with new vanity and medicine cabinet
●	Coin laundry and tons of free storage in the basement
●	Newly refinished hardwood floors with built-in stained glass hutch
●	Secure gated and cedar fenced-in backyard and patio for grilling
●	Zoned (inexpensive stickers) street parking makes it easy
●	Close to Avondale Bowl, Sleeping Village, Crawfords, BK, Taco Bell, and Dunkin'
Location - 3071 N. Haussen
Call text or reply now, be happy.
Thanks for reading.
Logan Square, Avondale, Bucktown, Humboldt Park, Roscoe Village, Wicker Park, Hermosa
